abstract: A look at what the technology blogs are saying about Google’s new phone.
snippet: A look at what the technology blogs are saying about Google’s new phone.
lead_paragraph: It’s official. As The Times’s Miguel Helft reported this morning, Google announced its first phone, the Nexus One. We just posted David Pogue’s review. Here’s a roundup of what the technology blogs are saying about the new phone.

headline.main: Google’s Nexus One: A Roundup of Coverage
